title: Icaritin and lenvatinib treatment for unresectable localized progressive pancreatic cancer: a report of six cases.
abstract: Pancreatic cancer is very difficult to detect in its early stages, and its rapid progression and poor prognosis make it a significant therapeutic challenge. Existing treatment modalities, whether standalone or combined, offer limited efficacy, highlighting an urgent need for more effective and less toxic therapeutic strategies.

POLYPHENOL: more effective and less toxic therapeutic strategies
